text: Antonio Miró (18 March 1947 – 3 February 2022) was a Spanish fashion designer. Miró was born in Sabadell, Spain. He was a costume designer in the 1979 Spanish drama Caniche. In 1986, he create a fashion company Antonio Miró. He was one of the founders of the Association of Fashion Creators of Spain. Miró also designed the costumes for the opening ceremony of the 1992 Summer Olympics. Miró died on 3 February 2022 in Barcelona, Spain from a heart attack, at the age of 74. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Spanish fashion designers Category:Spanish costume designers Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:People from Sabadell
title: Antonio Miró
